DOC.brief_summary: Study in order to quantify toxin removal during dialysis
DOC.criteria: Substudy 1: includes new starting dialysis patients on peritoneal dialysis PD or haemodialysis HD Substudy 2: stabile haemodialysis patients and peritoneal dialysis patients. Patients will be matched for gender, time on dialysis, diabetes, renal function at the start of dialysis. Substudy 3: patients on CAPD (continuous ambulant PD) or CCPD (continuous cyclic PD).
